title: Avoiding abelian and additive powers in rich words
abstract:
This paper concerns the avoidability of abelian and additive powers in
infinite rich words. In particular, we construct an infinite additive
$5$-power-free rich word over $\{0,1\}$ and an infinite additive $4$-power-free
rich word over $\{0, 1, 2\}$. The alphabet sizes are as small as possible in
both cases, even for abelian powers.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Formal Languages and Automata Theory
